name: Mace
overview: What is this? How could you be driving your Datsun, and suddenly you are somewhere else? Is it the future or the past? Is it nowhere? Maybe it is a nightmare. All you have is a spikey ball on a chain. A MACE, that's it. That's what they used to call it. It mast be the past, but something tells you it's not. But you have no time to think, only to fight. No time to work out if this is only a dream. If these creatures kill you , you may wake up. And then again you might not....
